net.sourceforge.jiu.data
Interface GrayIntegerImage

All Superinterfaces:
GrayImage, IntegerImage, PixelImage
All Known Subinterfaces:
BilevelImage, Gray16Image, Gray8Image
All Known Implementing Classes:
MemoryBilevelImage, MemoryGray16Image, MemoryGray8Image
public interface GrayIntegerImage
extends GrayImage, IntegerImage

An empty interface for grayscale images which have integer values of up to 32 bits (int or smaller) as samples. An interface composed of GrayImage and IntegerImage.

Like all extensions of GrayImage, this image data class supports only one channel.

Since:
0.9.0
Author:
Marco Schmidt
See Also:
GrayImage, IntegerImage
